title: Carfax Used Cars Scraper
description: Scrape used car listings from Carfax.com. Provide a start URL or use filters like make, model, price range, and mileage. Extracts detailed vehicle information including VIN, price, mileage, and Carfax reports.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific Carfax search URL. If provided, this will be used instead of filters.

location.title: Location
location.description: Location or ZIP code to search near.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of vehicles
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of vehicles to collect.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: A safety cap on the number of search result pages to visit.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy (residential recommended for Carfax).
